title: Alexander & Hornung Recalls Fully Cooked Pork Products  	Due to Possible Listeria Contamination
summary: EDITOR’S NOTE: Dec. 11, 2021: This product recall has been expanded from 234,391 pounds to 2,320,774 pounds, with an expanded list of fully cooked ham and pepperoni products that may be contaminated with Listeria monocytogenes. The expanded list of products are highlighted in the product...
